name: Residents of Chaos
description:
Welcome to Residents of Chaos, Will you be the last to survive?

Compete against others as you try to survive the endless onslaught of disasters including Earthquakes, Scorching heats, Wildfires, Virus outbreaks and much more.

  • Earn cash by surviving disasters and collecting it around the map.
  • Buy items to help you survive or sabotage other players.
  • Craft Items as a cheaper way of acquiring things (currently can only cook food).
  • Sabotage other players as you place traps to mess with them.
  • Survive the onslaught of disasters.
Controls:
  • move: WASD
  • toggle run: SHIFT
  • look: Move Mouse
  •  cycle held item: Mouse Scroll
  • use held item: Right Click
  • drop held item: R
  • interact: E
  • lock interface: TAB
  • talk: Click on chat input and type
  • cycle viewed player: Space
  • open game menu: ESC
Minimum Specs:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Storage: 1.5GB
  • Internet Connection Required.
Other Notes / Warnings:
  • This Game is in early alpha and everything is subject to change and does not represent the final product. In its current stage please think of it as a demo rather than a full game.
  • If you cant join a server its likely that the server is currently full or you don't have the correct game version.
  • This Game contains flashing lights.
  • Anything said in the games chat is by other players so what they say is not my responsibility .
  • Do Not distribute the game or claim it as your own, all versions must come from this page.
